message: Thunk! {user} got pelted with a snowball... you gonna take that lying down?
{user} is just too quick! You missed!
Sound the trumpets of war (doot doot)—the reckoning has begun. {user} got hit with a snowball!
You throw a snowball with all your might, just for it to land a few inches from your feet. You missed! Maybe you should work on your arm strength a bit...
{user} wasn’t even paying attention to chat… and they got smacked by a snowball anyways! Hey {user} — use /collect, then /throw to get ‘em back!
A shoebill blocked your shot—damn those stinky shoebills. You missed!
Pow, right in the kisser! {user} got slugged by a snowball.
Whoosh! You missed, but there’s always another snowball. /collect some more and show ‘em what for!
